subscriptionExpired.title: Your Subscription Has Expired
subscriptionExpired.description: You need to renew your subscription to continue performing analyses.

tokenLimit.title: Analysis Limit Reached
tokenLimit.description: You've reached your monthly analysis limit. Upgrade your plan to perform more analyses.

emailNotVerified.title: Email Verification Required
emailNotVerified.description: You need to verify your email address to continue performing analyses.

fileTooLarge.title: File Too Large
fileTooLarge.description: The file you uploaded exceeds the maximum file size limit. Please choose a smaller file.

invalidFile.title: Invalid File Format
invalidFile.description: Unsupported file format. Please select a file in .txt, .doc, .docx, .pdf or .md format.

aiServiceUnavailable.title: AI Service Unavailable
aiServiceUnavailable.description: The AI analysis service is currently unavailable. Please try again in a few minutes.

networkError.title: Connection Error
networkError.description: Check your internet connection and try again.

validationError.title: Validation Error
validationError.description: There are errors in your input. Please check and try again.

unknownError.title: Unknown Error
unknownError.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please refresh the page or try again.

errors.helpText: If the problem persists, please contact our support team.
